description: Adds columns from stats into longitudinal qdec table, using longitudinally processed results.

qdec.title: QDEC Table File
qdec.description: QDEC table file specifying the subjects and time points. File has first columns: fsid  fsid-base

stats.title: Stats File
stats.description: The stats file, e.g. aseg.stats or lh.aparc.stats

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: The stats measure (e.g. volume, thickness, mean, std)

subject_dir.title: Subject Directory
subject_dir.description: Full path to FreeSurfer subjects directory

output_qdec.title: Output QDEC Table
output_qdec.description: File name of output long qdec table

output_stats.title: Output Stats Table
output_stats.description: File name to output stacked stats table (all subjects, all time points)

input_stats.title: Input Stacked Stats Table
input_stats.description: File name of stacked stats table (same order as qdec), instead of using --stats and --meas

cross_sectional.title: Cross Sectional Flag
cross_sectional.description: Use cross sectional results (for testing only)
